Description: Woman's shawl; woven of cotton, silk or rayon; blue and white cotton shawl, with line of red, green, black and orange silk embroidery down centre; strip of yellow and red checks along each short side.
Acquisition notes: Af1988,07.1 and 2 are a weddiong dress and a shawl, both made and purchased in Siwa, Egypt, in 1988; they were purchased from Mr Adrian Richardson.
